featured.text: A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

definition.zh_def: 協和號（Concorde）是一種超音速客機，能以超過音速的速度飛行，主要用於商業航空。
definition.en_def: Concorde is a supersonic passenger airliner that could fly faster than the speed of sound, primarily used for commercial aviation.
definition.example: The Concorde was known for its ability to travel from New York to London in just under three hours.
